Animation

public Animation(java.lang.String name,
                 Iinterpolator interpolator,
                 java.lang.Object targetObject,
                 int triggerTime)
creates a new Animation object with the given interpolator.
if animating a concrete object, the targetObject should be passed as a parameter. If the Animation has no concrete target "null" can be passed

Parameters:
name - the name
interpolator - the interpolator
targetObject - the target object
triggerTime - the trigger time
